alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps; Pulaski; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:31PM CDT until May 13 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Dent County in south central Missouri... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Missouri... North central Texas County in south central Missouri... Southwestern Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 531 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located 10 miles east of Fort Leonard Wood, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Leonard Wood... St. Robert... Edgar Springs... Lenox... Beulah... Lecoma... Lake Spring... Anutt... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 163 and 164, and between mile markers 180 and 183. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
